creditline: Gift of Leo and Doris Hodroff
description: pear-shaped; two large ships on rough sea; sampan below spout; fan-shaped pagoda roofs among clouds; cover has wide pink diaper border with four landscape panels; chrysanthemum finial
markings: on bottom and under cover; various stickers
object_name: Teapot with quasi-European ship and chop boat
title: Teapot with quasi-European ship and chop boat
